snippet: Entangling threads of art, night life, music and fashion, the Hole, a contemporary art gallery in Lower Manhattan, has emerged as a successor to the departed Deitch Projects on the downtown social circuit.
abstract: Lower Manhattan contemporary art gallery The Hole NYC has emerged over last couple years as cool-kid clubhouse on downtown social circuit, luring graffiti kids, art-world scions and celebrities to its rowdy openings for of-the-moment artists.
lead_paragraph: Entangling threads of art, night life, music and fashion, the Hole, a contemporary art gallery in Lower Manhattan, has emerged as a successor to the departed Deitch Projects on the downtown social circuit.

headline.seo: The Hole Showcases Art, but It’s a Place to Party
headline.main: Art? Oh, Yeah. But We’re Here to Party.
headline.print_headline: Art? Oh, Yeah. But We’re Here to Party.
